high_consensus.description: Per-sprint rollback runbook links in acceptance criteria
Enumerate pre-existing test failures by name/signature/ticket
Auto-generated import manifest for schema audit completeness
PoolId vocabulary decision tree for non-additive changes
MicroUSD arithmetic semantics spec (BigInt, rounding, overflow, intermediates)

blockers.concern: Canonicalization contract + fixture update policy for wire fixtures
Interop handshake: captured traffic should be non-optional
Degraded evaluator: max duration, backpressure, retry storm prevention
Exhaustive WAL consumer inventory + forward-compatible unknown type handling
Lenient read / strict write transition for persisted MicroUSD values
Pin to immutable commit SHA instead of mutable tag
Shadow mode via injected WriteGate interface, not scattered conditionals
